com.orbitz.monitoring.api.monitor
Class AbstractCompositeMonitor

java.lang.Object
  com.orbitz.monitoring.api.monitor.AbstractMonitor
      com.orbitz.monitoring.api.monitor.AbstractCompositeMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompositeMonitor, Monitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
TransactionMonitor
public abstract class AbstractCompositeMonitor
extends AbstractMonitor
implements CompositeMonitor

An abstract base class suitable for extending to obtain common behavior of CompositeMonitors.

getInheritableAttributes

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getInheritableAttributes()
Description copied from interface: CompositeMonitor
Gets those attributes that can be inherited by the child monitors. These attributes will be added to the child monitor when it is created.

Specified by:
getInheritableAttributes in interface CompositeMonitor
Returns:
a reference to the map of the inheritable attributes that should be added to the child monitors
